create.exists: A team with this name or short-name does exist ({{ teamName }}).
create.success: Team {{ teamName }} has been created successfully.
create.error: An error occurred while creating the team. {{ error }}

delete.not-found: Team with name {{ teamName }} was not found.
delete.success: Team {{ teamName }} has been deleted successfully.
delete.error: An error occurred while deleting the team. {{ error }}
